text: Broadway theatre means the theatrical performances in the 41 professional theatres, each with 500 or more seats, in the Theater District and Lincoln Center along Broadway, in Midtown Manhattan, New York City in the United States.Pincus-Roth, Zachary. "Ask Playbill.com: Broadway or Off-Broadwayâ€”Part I". Playbill, February 7, 2008, accessed September 11, 2016Viagas, Robert. "Hudson Theatre Will Be Reopened as Broadway House". Playbill, December 16, 2015 Broadway and London's West End together represent the highest commercial level of live theater in the English-speaking world. ==References== Category:Entertainment in New York City
title: Broadway theatre
